englishTranslationText: Then	none	will	be	able	to	deny	its	occurrence.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	waqt	uske	hone	meiñ	kisi	ko	inkār	ki	
gunjaish	na	hogi

englishTranslationText: The	event	will	be	abasing	some,	and	exalting	some.
romanUrduTranslationText: Kisi	ko	past	karne	wāli,	kisi	ko	bulandi	dene	wāli

englishTranslationText: When	the	earth	will	tremble,	shivering.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jab	zameen	kāñpe	gi	thar-tharā	kar

englishTranslationText: And	the	mountains	will	be	crushed,	blown	to	bits.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	pahārd	reza	reza	ho	jāyeñ	ge	choora	hokar

englishTranslationText: So	they	will	become	like	fine	dust,	scattered	in	a	shaft	of	light.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	ho	jāyeñ	ge	jaise	rauzan	(Surākh)	ki	dhoop	meiñ	ghubār	ke	bareek	zarre	phaile	huwe.

englishTranslationText: And	you	will	become	divided	into	three	categories.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	tum	teen	qism	ke	ho	jāoge..

englishTranslationText: So	those	on	the	right	–	how	(fortunate)	are	those	on	the	right!
romanUrduTranslationText: To	dahini	taraf	wāle	kaise	dahni	taraf	wāle

englishTranslationText: And	those	on	the	left	–	how	(wretched)	are	those	on	the	left!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	bāyiñ	taraf	wāle	kaise	bāyiñ	taraf	wāle

englishTranslationText: And	those	who	surpassed	have	indeed	excelled.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jo	sabqat	le	gaye	woh	to	sabqat	hi	le	gaye

englishTranslationText: It	is	they	who	are	the	close	ones.
romanUrduTranslationText: Wohi	muqarrab-e-bārgah	haiñ

englishTranslationText: They	are	in	Gardens	of	peace.
romanUrduTranslationText: Chain	ke	bāghoñ	meiñ

englishTranslationText: A	large	group	from	the	earlier	generations.
romanUrduTranslationText: Agloñ	meiñ	se	ek	giroh

englishTranslationText: And	a	few	from	the	latter.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	pichhloñ	meiñ	se	thode

englishTranslationText: On	studded	thrones.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jadāo	takhtoñ	par	hoñge

englishTranslationText: Reclining	on	them,	facing	each	other.
romanUrduTranslationText: Un	par	takiya	lagaye	huwe	āmne	sāmne.

englishTranslationText: Surrounded	by	immortal	boys.		.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke	gird	liye	phireñ	ge	hamesha	rehne	
wāle	ladke

englishTranslationText:
Carrying	bowls	and	pitchers	–	and	cups	
filled	with	wine	flowing	before	them.		.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kooze	aur	āaftābe	aur	jām	āañkhoñ	ke	
sāmne	behti	sharāb	ke	.

englishTranslationText:
Their	heads	shall	not	ache	with	it,	nor	
shall	they	lose	their	senses.			.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	se	na	unheiñ	dard-e-sar	ho	na	hosh	
meiñ	farq	āaye

englishTranslationText: And	fruits	that	they	may	like.					.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	mewe	jo	pasand	kareñ

englishTranslationText: And	meat	of	birds	that	they	may	wish.					.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	parindoñ	ka	gosht	jo	chāhen

englishTranslationText: And	gorgeous	eyed	fair	maidens.						.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	badi	āañkh	wāliyañ	Hooreiñ
